column5: Got out on the big pond again today.Another day that was supposed to be ugly but had the greatest weather again.Fishing today was as good as it possibly could be.Brought 10 dozen minnows and myself and Larry and Joe polished them off by 2.1/8 oz jigs and minnows worked great.Water temp around 67f so temp dropped since I was there couple of days ago.Keeping fish fairly shallow.Didnt see any may fly action.So many walleyes again in the 20-25"size.Just amazing pulling them fish in.Been guiding for my buddy who runs the Pine Grove Motel in Vermilion Bay.Has cabins for rent and does AP pkg from there.Can do different lake everyday so kinda interesting week of fishing.Todays lu√±ch.Nice touch.Had to stop fishing to enjoy that sandwich
Looks like a doozy of a day john,I'm heading up sat I'll look for you when flying over the big pond.
Have a good trip Rod.I won't be on the big pond.Weekend off.Need to rest my arms.lol.
Rest your arm??did you get a good dose from a booster shot?

None of the shots were a problem.Catching all them 22-24" walleyes did.lol.But managed to get out with wife around 9 for some muskie.Saw one and caufht a small one that I managed to shake off.lol.Got a smallmouth to on my spinner bait.Saw storm coming again so got off lake at 1.Just pouring again and its lightning and thunder again.Crazy weather.But dodged 3 storms now.
Those 22 to 24 can really bull dog in the warm water,after awhile I hear ya they can wear you out.
Thanks for the report...I'm headed to Ear Falls Saturday!
I'll be back out there tomorrow.Hopefully it's as good as the other day.
